product_name: Brooks D'Lite Low Rise Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A long run under a hot sun is no problem for the D'Lite Low Rise Shorts from Brooks. Lightweight and breathable, they're designed keep you comfortable no matter how many miles you log. Lightweight, breathable stretch-polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly; stretch-nylon liner briefs also aid moisture transfer for cool, dry comfort. Wide, low-rise waistband lies flat against skin; zippered rear pocket stores ID, key or energy gel. 4 in. inseam delivers just-right coverage. Brooks D'Lite Low Rise Shorts feature reflective details for enhanced visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: A long run under a hot sun is no problem for the D'Lite Low Rise Shorts from Brooks. Lightweight and breathable, they're designed keep you comfortable no matter how many miles you log.
